tool_description: The Profile Hub API is a RESTful API that provides access to user data on a social media platform. With the Profile Hub API, developers can retrieve information such as first name, last name, username, email, post, image, avatar, comment, and like data for a given number of users. This API is perfect for developers looking to build applications that require social media integration or user data. The Profile Hub API is easy to use and can be integrated into any application or website with ease.
name: ProfileHub API
title: ProfileHub API

api_list.name: User Data
api_list.description: Retrieves user data for a specific user ID. This endpoint returns information such as the user's first name, last name, username, email address, posts made by the user, images posted by the user, avatar image URL, comments made by the user, and posts liked by the user.
